Header: President Appreciates & Thanks All Involved in Flood Relief Work
Content: HE the President Maithripala Sirisena in a communiqué issued through the President’s Media Division has thanked the tri-services, Police, Governors of all Provinces, state officials, volunteer organizations and all parties for their continuous welfare assistance, being provided to flood victims in the North. “Members of the Security Forces and other state officials were engaged in 24-hour service to help the victims and their humanitarian mission aided to reduce the loss of properties and lives. The continuous contributions, made to provide welfare facilities for those people in the north who are currently displaced due to severe climatic conditions is worthy of my appreciation and thanks,” the Presidential communiqué added.
